div.p: Horus son of Pausiris through Ammonius, (his) friend, to Apolloâ€” and Harpaesis and their associate sitologi of the upper toparchy, district of Monimou, greetings. Transfer the (artabas) that you hold on deposit for me, from the wheat-crop of the 19th year of Hadrianus Caesar the lord, to Psammis son of Psammis, (for his account) at Mermertha, twenty (and) one-quarter artabas, at the hamlet of Istrou, six (and) one-half (and) one-quarter artabas (and) seven choenices, grand total twenty-seven artabas (and) seven choenices of wheat. (N. Gonis)
